overview: A documentary about whether there is a happy old age in Russia. The hero of the film is old in body, but not old in spirit. He grows old so as not to lose the joy of life and clarity of vision. Is this an oddity or an example for others? The film talks about the key issues of life and death. The film will allow us to come closer to accepting the immutable fact that one day everyone will have to ask themselves "Do I have a life after retirement?"
title: Life After Retirement
